author: kodolova
body:
#### PR description:

<!-- Please replace this text with a description of the feature proposed or problem addressed, specifying:
    The collection of JPT jets should be increased slightly as the reconstruction efficiency for
Low-pt jets is increased. A small collection of additional Calojets seeding is created. The overall increase of event size is 100 bytes/ev measured over QCD Flat sample with PU.
Timing is increased 0.03 s/ev.
  - what changes are expected in the output if any, 
  - what other PRs or externals it depends upon if any,
  - link to any additional material useful to provide a documentation for this PR (slides, JIRA tickets, related pull requestes, hypernews, TWiki or Indico pages)  -->

https://indico.cern.ch/event/923095/

title: JPT_TrackJetsSeeds_Reco_and_PATrereco
